@Internal @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault

Package io.spine.server.model

This package provides classes and interfaces for message processing model of a Spine-based application.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    HandlerMethod.Factory<H extends HandlerMethod>
    The interface for factory objects that can filter Method objects that represent handler methods and create corresponding HandlerMethod instances that wrap those methods.
    MethodAttribute<V>
    Meta-data set to a HandlerMethod.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HandlerMethod<C extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An abstract base for wrappers over methods handling messages.
    HandlerMethodPredicate<C extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    The predicate for filtering message handling methods.
    HandlerMethods
    Utilities for working with handler methods.
    MessageHandlerMap<M extends io.spine.type.MessageClass,H extends HandlerMethod>
    Provides mapping from a class of messages to a method which handles such messages.
    MethodPredicate
    A filter for methods by annotation, method parameters, and return type.
    Model
    Stores information of message handling classes.
    ModelClass<T>
    A class that belongs to a Model.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ExternalAttribute
    A meta-attribute of the Method, telling whether this method handles the objects, produced outside of the current bounded context.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HandlerMethodFailedException
    Signals that invocation of a message handling method failed with an exception.
  • Error Summary 
    Error Description
    DuplicateCommandHandlerError
    An error thrown on attempt to add a class which declares a method that handles a command which is already handled by a class already added to the Model.
    DuplicateHandlerMethodError
    Indicates that more than one handling method for the same message class are present in the declaring class.
    ModelError
    A programming error of message processing definition.

Package io.spine.server.model Description

This package provides classes and interfaces for message processing model of a Spine-based application.
